welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Zulia, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and beautiful landscapes. Get ready to immerse yourself in the local flavors and unique experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore all that El Zulia has in store for you!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Camilo Dazo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Camilo Dazo Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Antonio Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Fria Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Fria Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
